description:
Walk it, hike it or ride it - these versatile bikes shoes can do all three without feeling weird. The stiff sole reduces foot fatigue from long days of pedalling, and the light midsole dampens vibrations from the road or trail. With a reinforced but breathable mesh upper, your feet stay comfortable whether you're hitting the trail or the bike lane.

  • Seamless mesh upper is breathable with reinforced TPU overlays for durability
  • EVA midsole offers lightweight cushioning and good vibration dampening
  • Nylon shank gives you a stiff platform to reduce foot fatigue
  • Carbon rubber outsole is grippy on flat pedals or the ground
  • Compatible with flat pedals and 2-bolt (SPD) cleats
name: Pearl Izumi X-Alp Canyon Cycling Shoes - Unisex
